Sudo is sudo.
Its like, you have a car, a bike and a jet. Then you add sudo. It becomes awesome car, awesome bike, awesome jet.
sudo just makes whatever comes after sudo run on super user mode.
Its like an adjective. Between just command and admin command.
When you write sudo you want to run a command on super user mode. Thats all there is to it.
First it prompts you for a password, then if the password is right it just executes whatever was in front of sudo as a super user.
